section.name: Current Astrogrid Releases
section.P: Follow the links to the left for the documentation for the current releases. This documentation in turn has links to the binaries, source code and installation information.

subsection.name: Itn06 Snapshot
subsection.P: The latest build is Itn06 Snapshot. This code is undergoing development and is built several times daily. The latest Itn06 build is deployed at least once a day to this portal on Twmbarlwm.

subsection.name: Itn06 TechPreview
subsection.P: The latest stable case build and published to Beta Testers. Milstone within Itn06 and should be built at the end of each cases after tested stable. TechPreview.

subsection.name: Itn06 Case 3
subsection.P: Case 3 has now been branched, but is not yet complete. The Maven docs for this branch can be found by following the link on the left. A snapshot of this case is installed on Zhumulangma.

subsection.name: Itn05 Release
subsection.P: The latest stable release is Itn05.
An installation of this release is on Cadairidris.

subsection.name: Itn04_1 Release
subsection.P: A demonstration of this release may be found here.

subsection.name: Itn04 and previous
subsection.P: Information on previous iterations can be found from the Itn04 link on the left. A demonstration of release Itn03 may be found here.
